name: Air Hockey Simulator
description:
An Air Hockey Simulator built specifically for the Leap Motion Controller. (Also supports mouse.)

Features

  • Play single player against the AI
  • Play cooperatively with a friend using the Leap Motion and the other using the mouse versus the AI.
  • Play competitively against a friend with one player using the Leap Motion and the other using the mouse.
  • Toggle between mouse and Leap Motion at anytime.
  • Earn virtual currency from matches to spend on different designs for your hockey mallet in the in-game shop.

Notes

To toggle between mouse and Leap Motion:

  • Player 1 - Press Q
  • Player 2 - Press E

If no Leap Motion is detected, the game will automatically default to mouse controls.
